title: New Feature: Stay Up To Date With Email Digest | Similarweb
description: Stay up-to-date with the latest website analytics! Get a daily email digest from Similarweb with our new feature on Similarweb Pro. Sign up now.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesNew Feature: Stay Up To Date With Email Digest Updates New Feature: Stay Up To Date With Email Digest Start your free trial by Adi Sarig 2 Min. February 2, 2020 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Never miss an opportunity to lead the market! Similarweb’s latest platform feature lets you receive monthly updates to your inbox on where your competitors are growing and which new keywords and potential partnerships you can go after. What type of insights will I be alerted about? Key performance metrics of you against your competitors, including: Market share Engagement metrics (time on site, pages per visit, bounce rate) Branded search traffic New opportunities you can go after, including: Affiliates opportunities Keywords opportunities How often will I get the insights? You will receive emails every month when the monthly snapshot is live on the platform. Usually, you can expect this to be between the first and second weeks of the month. How can I get the insights to my inbox? If you already have an arena in your Workspace, and you want to get an email digest every month when new data is released: Go to your Workspace Click on Settings Opt in to get monthly email digests for your arena If you haven’t created your arena yet: Go to your Workspace Create an arena by typing your domain and your competitors’ domains Opt in to get monthly email digests for your arena Don’t have access to Workspace? Contact your account manager to receive full access. by Adi Sarig Adi Sarig is experienced in online marketing and passionate about technology, media, and marketing.
